issue.title: [Rust] Tests fail when following instructions in README
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10186](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10186). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If I follow the instructions from the README and set the test paths as follows, some of the IPC tests fail with "no such file or directory".
```java

export PARQUET_TEST_DATA=../cpp/submodules/parquet-testing/data
export ARROW_TEST_DATA=../testing/data  
```
If I change them to absolute paths as follows then the tests pass:
```java

export PARQUET_TEST_DATA=`pwd`/../cpp/submodules/parquet-testing/data
export ARROW_TEST_DATA=`pwd`/../testing/data  
```
